Title: Resolution disapproving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200077 ZSM, for the grant of a special permit (L.U. No. 680).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

\v0\par
By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\par
\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, REEC St. Marks LP, filed an application pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-79 of the Zoning Resolution to \cf1 allow the \cf0 transfer of 8,386 square feet of unused development rights from 4 St. Mark\rquote s Place (the landmark) to 3 St. Mark\rquote s Place (the development site) and modify the height and setback regulations of the Zoning Resolution Section 33-432 to facilitate the development of a 10-story commercial building located at 3 St. Mark\rquote s Place (Block 464, Lots 1, 3, and 59) on the border of the NoHo and East Village neighborhoods in Manhattan Community District 3 (ULURP No. C 200077 ZSM) (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\li39\ri158\qj\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\ri158\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on August 24, 2020, its decision dated August 19, 2020 (the \ldblquote Decision\rdblquote ) on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission has made the findings required pursuant to Section 74-792(e) of\cf1  t\cf0 he Zoning Resolution of the City of New York;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 24, 2020;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and environmental implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued October 28\super th\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP094M) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 201 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200077 ZSM\b ,\b0  incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council disapproves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f0 Adopted.\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Office of the City Clerk,\}\par
